text: Jara tumhi paigambara (muham'mada sallallahu alaihi vasallama) ci madata na karala tara allahaneca tyanci madata keli asa veli jevha kaphira lokanni tyanna (desa) bahera ghalavile hote. Donapaiki dusara jevha te doghe gupheta hote, jevha te apalya sathidarasa sangata hote, cinta karu naka allaha amacya sobata ahe. Tevha allahaneca apalyatarphe santi-samadhana utaravuna asa sain'yandvare tyanna madata pohacivali, jyanna tumhi pahilesud'dha nahi. Tyane kaphiranca bola khali padala ani motha va uttama bola tara allahacaca ahe. Sarvasrestha allaha varcasvasali ani hikamata balaganara ahe
